definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: She tore ligament in her ankle while she was playing squash.
sentences.chinese: 她在打壁球时把踝部韧带拉伤了。

sentences.english: Stage I. Transverse fracture of medial malleolus or rupture of deltoid ligament.
sentences.chinese: 度内踝的横行骨折或三角韧带断裂。

sentences.english: Stage II. Rupture of anterior tibiofibular ligament and interosseous ligament.
sentences.chinese: II度胫腓前韧带和骨间膜断裂。

sentences.english: The ACL is a ligament that connects the top and bottom portions of the knee.
sentences.chinese: 前侧交叉韧带是连接膝关节顶部和底部的韧带。

sentences.english: The ACL is a ligament that connects the top and bottom portions of the knee.
sentences.chinese: 前侧交叉韧带是连接膝关节顶部和底部的韧带。

sentences.english: Neck muscles and ligaments caused by the tension and rigidity.
sentences.chinese: 造成颈后肌群和韧带的紧张及僵硬。

sentences.english: Stage I. Rupture of anterior tibiofibular ligament.
A sprain is an injury to a ligament caused by excessive stretching.
sentences.chinese: 扭伤是由于过度拉伸而引起的韧带受伤。

sentences.english: Inner canthus ligament almost projected on the middle of the sac.
sentences.chinese: 内眦韧带几乎横压于泪囊中部。

sentences.english: In surgical operation, the hypertrophic part of ligamenta flava should…
sentences.chinese: 手术时要求彻底切除肥厚黄韧带。

sentences.english: Log the source address for ACL-related connection drops.
sentences.chinese: 日志源地址为前交叉韧带有关的掉线。

sentences.english: Fortunately, cruciate ligament injuries are relatively uncommon in the cat.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，十字韧带受伤是比较少见的猫。

sentences.english: Can the Normal Pulmonary Ligament and Phrenic Nerve Be Seen on Chest Radiographys?
sentences.chinese: 正常的肺韧带和膈神经在胸片上能看到吗？

sentences.english: This is caused by a total rupture of its ligamentous system and large capsule tears.
sentences.chinese: 这是造成其总韧带断裂系统和大型胶囊眼泪。

sentences.english: Objective An anatomical study was carried out to examine the existence of the inframammary crease ligament.
sentences.chinese: 目的检验乳下皱襞韧带存在的真实性。

definition: articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
